what: This package help analyze the impacts of climate change on bushfires.
title: This package help analyze the impacts of climate change on bushfires.
text: goal ausbushfire help analyze impacts climate change bushfires Australia using Fire Weather Index(FWI). provides tidy data includes app visualize . dataset includes annual ERA5 averages soil moisture providing KNMI region New South Wales, Australia.
